name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WorkStreamer Guide: Craft Screenshot Training Guides Incredibly Fast

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create beautiful training guides in minutes with this automated screenshot tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you have to create training guides for your team and you're dreading taking all the screenshots, then this may be your new favorite tool.  

WorkStreamer Guide is an extension you add to Chrome, Edge, or Brave browser that let's you automatically capture screenshots on every webpage you visit just by clicking Start.  When you're finished, click Stop, and all screenshots are compiled into a guide.  

ğŸ“‹ You can add text, blur sensitive info, and highlight parts of each screenshot.  When you're finished, share a link to the guide, download it as a MS Word document, or export it as a video slideshow. 

ğŸ§©Say goodbye to long and tedious hours spent capturing individual screenshots and pasting them into word documents. 

ğŸ§©Say hello to an incredibly fast way to create and share training with your team, clients, or organization. 

âš™ï¸ How does it work?
1ï¸âƒ£ Install this extension Chrome, Edge, or Brave Browser. 
2ï¸âƒ£ Enter your email at https://guide.workstreamer.com/signin
3ï¸âƒ£ Click Start then navigate to any website you want to record
4ï¸âƒ£ Click Stop then edit the guide and download or share.

That's it. In 4 simple steps, you can unleash the power of beautiful and fast training guides.

Prove to yourself how fast and effortless creating training can be.  Start with a free 30 day trial (no credit card required).
